extends Object

      • checkIfUsernameExists

        public boolean checkIfUsernameExists(String username)
        Will check if such user name exists. This method should be used when creating and updating user to avoid duplicate user names.
        Parameters:
        username - to be checked if it exists
        Returns:
        true if username exists
